content:
Hi, I've recently un-lurked in other threads, so thought I should introduce myself properly!

My name is Oisin McGuinness, located in NYC, and I'm interested in elliptic curves, computational number theory, arithmetical algebraic geometry and related (e.g formal groups). Recently retired from a long-term financial sector job (mostly systems admin, security and systems programming in a variety of languages) and wanting to get involved in Lean and mathlib/mathlib4.
